item.title: [ 50] Last character you played as must beat Kira, can they do it?
item.description:
>merely being immune to the death note does not count as a win, your character must actually stop Light, else it's a win for Kira
>destroying earth/japan/whatever and taking Light as collateral damage does not count as a win, it must be a conscious and targeted move at Light
>your character can have outside help from their allies unless said ally is some sort of god capable of instantly pointing Kira's identity, because then there is no merit for your character
Well? Can they do it?

item.title: [ 76] Stop whining. If you wanted to buy Resident Evil 4 on January 25th 2005, you'd
item.description:
Stop whining. If you wanted to buy Resident Evil 4 on January 25th 2005, you'd have to spend the equivalent of USD$90 adjusted for inflation.

If you weren't a rich, spoiled suburban white kid, you were not even able to game.

Nowadays, gaming is more and more accessible and way cheaper.

Stop complaining about prices. Enjoy your games and your unlimited options.

Original filename: Screenshot_20250508_205916_Gallery.jpg
item.author: Anonymous

item.title: [202] New Doom Details
item.description:
22 Missions Total
- 9 hours for the first 10 missions
- Biggest enemy variety of any Doom
- 9-12 unique weapons
- One codex collectible per level
- Big focus on story in cutscenes
- Chaingun turret sections where you defend a point
- Doom Slayer moves slower, feels powerful like a tank
- Smooth 60FPS performance with raytracing
- Supports DualSense haptics
- Missions are much bigger and can be longer than most Doom Eternal and 2016 missions.
- Gameplay wise it has to be one of the most innovative FPS games I've ever played.
- The shield saw is utilized well and can be used for most of the genuine glory kills. It's also reminiscent of the meathook from Doom Eternal in the form of a far destructive dash.
- Melee and parrying is very important, whether it's used with shields or melee
- fun and never repetitive or boring. - Rocket launcher can be used as a grenade launcher now, and the plasma rifle can be used with one or two barrels. The nail gun can also be automatic or as a sniper
-Mech gameplay makes you feel like godzilla in a city, you're able to smash through buildings and destroy toy sized tanks in the way.
- Combat with titans also utilizes the parry system with melee aside from the chaingun you receive to take them on from a distance.
- Dragon gameplay is very versatile and allows you to hop on and off in certain sections as well as perform special glory kills after some "bullet" parry combos with titans and ships.
- Cutscenes contain a much better written script than previous titles and are much more serious and gritty.
- Definitely game of the year material. -Puts Doom 2016 in third place, Doom Eternal in second place, and the Dark Ages in first.

Original filename: IMG_0123.jpg
item.author: Anonymous

item.title: [ 52] US-UK Trade Deal
item.description:
UK and US announce trade deal to save thousands of British jobs, Starmer says

https://news.sky.com/story/uk-and-us-agree-trade-deal-as-starmer-and-trump-make-announcement-in-live-phone-call-13363710

The UK and US have agreed a trade deal, with Sir Keir Starmer and Donald Trump confirming the announcement during a live televised phone call.

It is the first trade deal agreed after Mr Trump began his second presidential term in January, and after he imposed strict tariffs on countries around the world in April.

Sir Keir said the "first-of-a-kind" deal with the US will save thousands of jobs across the UK, boost British business and protect British industry.

Original filename: starmer_trump.jpg
item.author: Anonymous

item.title: [225] Franco-Belgian/Eurocomics Storytime
item.description:
Hello /co/, how are we all today?

Today, I bring you a fresh euro scanlation. This is another volume in the Tales of the Octopus, a series about various somewhat super-powered characters living in the underworld criminal milieu of Paris in the late 1800s-early 1900s.

Previous storytimes here:
https://desuarchive.org/co/thread/146663516/#146663516
https://desuarchive.org/co/thread/148091423/#148091423

And downloads here:
https://www.mediafire.com/folder/w888ik5znv7ly/The_Tales_of_the_Octopus


This time, we have the story of Celestin, who's been working as a waiter at the Inn of the Octopus, headquarters of the main gang we've been dealing with, for a curiously long time.

Original filename: 001.jpg
item.author: Anonymous

item.title: [269] /pcbg/ - PC Building General
item.description:
>UPGRADE & BUILD ADVICE
Post build list or current specs including MONITOR: https://pcpartpicker.com/
Provide specific use cases (e.g. 4K editing, high FPS gaming)
State budget and COUNTRY or you will not be helped

NEWS
>RTX 5060, RX 9060 XT, and Arc B770 expected with Computex

>12VHPWR
If a 12VHPWR connector is not fully seated in its socket, the connection can melt.
Do not use aftermarket cables or adapters.

>Intel Raptor Lake / RPL Refresh
Instability reported with 13th and 14th gen, i5 K SKUs and above (incl non-K). Update BIOS and apply Intel Baseline settings. Avoid purchases.

>CPUS
HTPC(4K60)/Web Browsing: i3 12100T
Gaming: R5 9600X; budget: i5 13400; eXtreme: R7 7800X3D
Multicore: Ultra 7 265K; budget: Ultra 5 235; destitute: i5 13400
>Avoid iGPU-less CPUs
>Existing AM4 board with an old chip? Consider a Zen 3 CPU

>GRAPHICS CARDS (@MSRP)
1080p: RTX 3060 12 GB / RTX 4060; ultra budget: used RTX 2060 Super
1440p: RTX 5070; RT: RTX 5070 Ti
2160p: RTX 5080; budget: RTX 5070 Ti
RX 9070 XT: reasonable if at least 33% cheaper than an RTX 5070 Ti or close to price of RTX 5070
Amateur production: RTX 3060 12GB, RTX 5060 Ti 16GB, used RTX 3090, used RTX 4090, RTX 5090

>RAM
DDR4: Zen3/AM4 - 2x 16GB 3600 MT/s CL18; for locked "non-K" 12th/13th/LGA1700 - 2x 16GB 3200 MT/s CL16
DDR5: Zen4/AM5 - 2x 16GB 6000 MT/s CL30; for Core Ultra/LGA1851 - 2x 16GB 6400MT/s CL32

>COOLERS
Thermaltake Phantom Spirit (or variant), Thermaltake Frozen Prism

>PSUS
A new PSU should be ATX 3.1 compliant
Aim for 50-75% PSU utilization at full system load
https://hwbusters.com/best_picks/best-atxv3-pcie5-ready-psus-picks-hardware-busters/

>SSDS
WD SN5000 2 TB, Samsung 990 Pro 2 TB
Avoid: cheapest NVMe SSDs
https://ssd.borecraft.com/

>MOTHERBOARDS
Good power delivery is required for Intel CPUs like the i5 13600K and above
Generally don't pair a K CPU with a B mobo chipset

>GAMING MONITORS
AOC Q27G3XMN, MSI MPG 321URX
https://pcpartpicker.com/user/pcbg/saved/dP3v4D

Prev: >>105195453

item.title: [ 55] USA still safe?
item.description:
This is not a thinly veiled bait thread. I and two friends all from Germany had been planning and saved up to visit Boston and NYC next year to visit a friend and then do a road trip to the West Coast. Also, to see the world cup. These friends have now cancelled all plans because they are scared to get send to a gulag in El Salvador. I am still debating to do a short trip by myself because I really want to see my friend in Boston. I do have interacted with some accounts on social media that report critically on your greatest ally, which might be a problem. Is it safe to travel to the US?

Original filename: 1242.jpg
item.author: Anonymous

item.title: [ 64] /tpg/ /rcg/ - Theme Park & Roller Coaster General
item.description:
Disneyland Abu Dhabi Edition

>Last Thread: >>2779327

>What is this thread? Why are there two companies?
Disney parks were initially founded as a way to celebrate the culture and history of America and provide middle class families with a fun-filled immersive experience. While theme parks are the main focus of these threads (and the title of the general) there is also discussion on other roller coasters & rides, as well as the parks themselves and trip planning too. That's where /rcg/ comes in.
>Can I talk about Disney/Universal parks in this thread?
Absolutely! Disney and Universal are currently competing for the Orlando theme park market and beyond! Universal is opening new resorts all around the US and new continents!

Thread Pro Tip: Talk about theme parks!

Park Crowd Tracker:
>https://queue-times.com/en-US/parks

Roller Coaster Database:
>https://rcdb.com/

Amusement Park News Sites:
>https://www.themeparkinsider.com/
>https://www.screamscape.com/
>https://www.coaster101.com/

Disney Park News:
>https://www.wdwnt.com/
>https://www.wdwmagic.com/
>https://www.allears.net
>https://www.mousesteps.com

>News
Disneyland Abu Dhabi announced as Disney's 7th resort and first in Middle East. Miral Group (United Arab Emirates government) will entirely fund and operate the park
https://disneyparksblog.com/disney-experiences/disney-announces-abu-dhabi-theme-park/
Epic Universe officially opens in two weeks, but previews are showing heavy operational issues
https://wdwnt.com/2025/05/breaking-harry-potter-and-the-battle-at-the-ministry-to-temporarily-close-during-final-week-of-epic-universe-previews/
And your local theme parks are probably open for weekends now

item.title: [217] /fglt/ - Friendly GNU/Linux Thread
item.description:
Users of all levels are welcome to ask questions about GNU/Linux and share their experiences.

*** Please be civil, notice the "Friendly" in every Friendly GNU/Linux Thread ***

Before asking for help, please check our list of resources.

If you would like to try out GNU/Linux you can do one of the following:
0) Install a GNU/Linux distribution of your choice in a Virtual Machine.
1) Use a live image and to boot directly into the GNU/Linux distribution without installing anything.
2) Dual boot the GNU/Linux distribution of your choice along with Windows or macOS.
3) Go balls deep and replace everything with GNU/Linux.

Resources: Please spend at least a minute to check a web search engine with your question.
Many free software projects have active mailing lists.

$ man %command%
$ info %command%
$ %command% -h/--help
$ help %builtin/keyword%

Don't know what to look for?
$ apropos %something%

Check the Wikis (most troubleshoots work for all distros):
https://wiki.archlinux.org
https://wiki.gentoo.org

/g/'s Wiki on GNU/Linux:
https://igwiki.lyci.de/wiki/Category:GNU/Linux

>What distro should I choose?
https://igwiki.lyci.de/wiki/Babbies_First_Linux
>What are some cool programs?
https://wiki.archlinux.org/index.php/list_of_applications
https://directory.fsf.org/wiki/Main_Page
https://suckless.org/rocks/
>What are some cool terminal commands?
https://www.commandlinefu.com/commands/browse
https://cheat.sh/
>Where can I learn the command line?
https://mywiki.wooledge.org/BashGuide
https://www.grymoire.com/Unix/
https://overthewire.org/wargames/bandit
>Where can I learn more about Free Software?
https://www.gnu.org/philosophy/philosophy.html
>How to break out of the botnet?
https://prism-break.org/en/categories/gnu-linux

/fglt/'s website:
https://fglt.nl

GNU/Linux Games:
>>>/t/1175569
>>>/vg/lgg

IRC: #sqt on Rizon
https://fglt.nl/irc.html

Previous thread: >>105173618

item.title: [296] AI Pokemon Thread /NAPT/ Thread 183: Hot for Teacher Edition
item.description:
This is a general thread for people to post their AI art, and make requests from others who may want to attempt making their own Pokemon related gens.

NovelAI is a paid AI generator. Opus tier users have "unlimited" Small/Normal generations, though editing tools require credits.

Microsoft's Bing AI is a free image generator that is powered by DALL·E 3.

Civitai is free using its ‘buzz’ currency. You get about 50 every day plus more for liking models and gens.
>civitai.com

Otaiku is a (mostly) free mobile app. An ad watch is required between each image generation unless you pay.
>ailla.biz/otaiku

Tensor is free to use as well, although you are limited to how many gens you can make per day.
>https://tensor.art/

Local Generation using Stable Diffusion requires a decent video card. Guides for local genning can be found in the /g/ threads:
>>>/g/sdg
>>>/g/ldg
Other Stable Diffusion threads are on: /h/, /e/, /d/, /b/, /vt/, /aco/, /trash/

Hailuo AI takes uploaded art and animates them based on the prompts you get. You get a 3-day free trial, followed by roughly 3 free gens a day afterward. Subscription plans are available.
>https://hailuoai.video/

Pastebin of Pokemon artists:
>https://pastebin.com/U0mmK3Tm (embed)

Characters with under 300 images will require more tags to have them look correct. This is a list of all Pokemon characters with over 300 images:
>https://danbooru.donmai.us/posts?tags=*_%28pokemon%29+&z=5

If you plan on sharing multiple images together, we'd recommend posting just one, and give links for the rest. This way we can conserve space.

This is a locally run html tool provided by ThatOneAiAnon. It keeps track of all artists you like and turns Danbooru's entire tag system in a collapsible list of buttons. You can edit all the js, css, html code to modify the tool. (Ask him for updated versions or more Nai4 tools)
>mega .nz/file/67xwTRSB#m0fPUmJRaWd3oh47gt6nw2LKNMe820TaiKdXTAhx8tI

Previous Thread:>>57751991

item.title: [ 50] Cake and dessert thread
item.description:
Thread for desserts you've made, discussion and questions. Feel free to post and rate.

Starting with a cake I made and am currently eating.

Base is biscuits with cinnamon. There is a thin layer of cherry jam on on top of the base.
The main body is mascarpone mousse, with strawberry and quark.
Top layer is vanilla and white chocolate. The red pattern is the same stuff, with a bit of coloring.
On top I have some strawberries and basil. The strawberries were not really good. They are imported at this time of year where I live, so they are mainly for show, not for flavor.
Basil is my home grown and really goes well with strawberry.

Original filename: 100_0684.jpg

item.title: [371] =POMF= (what are we doing) at (the bed) roll?
item.description:
It's been a long vacation, PAW Patrol friends. It's unfortunate that 4chan didn't come back on a little bit earlier last week since it seems Badway was, as they say, an S-tier episode over there. Anyway, this week's Jap ep is two new subseries eps, Pups Stop a Junk-Monster and Twisty Top Mesa. PAW Party 2025 is announced, coming 7/11, and of course one of the episodes is Ryder's Surprise. A big event with Yokohama is happening, with the first appearance of the Rocky and Zuma mascots. Lots of toys are out, including everyone's favorite humping trio.

On the Western side, Season 11 is almost done. Skye's Roadtrip is this weekend, and then the long-awaited Zuma dream ep next week.

Super PAW Patrol thread, start!

The sticky probably needs to be updated, I'll keep the thread open for suggestions:

/trv/ is a slow board, so don't expect immediate responses. CHECK THE CATALOG – you might find threads already discussing topics you're interested in.

Before asking for suggestions, tell /trv/ about your:
>Budget

This makes it easier to give quality advice. Of course, keep your posts travel related.

item.title: [ 61] Anybody from a third-world country ever (legally) travel to the US?
item.description:
Is it really as hard as it seems? My friend in Colombia is trying to visit the US but it seems unreasonably hard to get a tourist visa. Do they really require an in-person interview at the US embassy in Bogota? He doesn't live anywhere near Bogota, how is that reasonable to expect him to travel all the way to Bogota ? Is there any way around that or can he do the interview over the phone? He's just trying to get a tourist visa, not become an immigrant, so why make him pay for a flight and take extra days off work just for a tourist visa?

And how long does it actually take to get a tourist visa approved? How long in advance does he need to plan the trip?

Original filename: US-visa-1366x768-2187306852.jpg
item.author: Anonymous
